synopsis.native: Le destin de Simone Veil, son enfance, ses combats politiques, ses tragédies. Le portrait épique et intime d’une femme au parcours hors du commun qui a bousculé son époque en défendant un message humaniste toujours d’une brûlante actualité.
synopsis.english: The biopic about Simone Veil, one of the prominent women in France in the 20th Century. Simone Veil’s life story, from her childhood to her major political battles, seen through the pivotal events of the twentieth century. An intimate and epic portrait of an extraordinary woman who eminently challenged and transformed her era: her humanist message is still keenly relevant today.
